title: Xin Baoxiao Xiaoyuan

alternative_titles.ja: 新爆笑校园 第一季

synopsis:
It tells the story of the protagonist, Daitou, who comes to the city from a village called Baichi Village to study and work. He meets various classmates and friends such as Wangcai, Xiaoyin, Nuomi Tuan, and Gao Chaisheng, and they share their hilarious daily life of studying and living together.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
